title: The Famous Picture of Cleopatra on the Wall; Denderah Temple, Upper Egypt.
description: Reliefs of Cleopatra and her son Caesarion carved into the wall of the Temple of Hathor at the Dendera Temple Complex.
name: Cleopatra, Queen of Egypt, d 30 B. C.
subject: Hieroglyphics; People; Temples
source: From: The Famous Picture of Cleopatra on the Wall; Denderah Temple, Upper Egypt.
